tool.name: tool_12

param.name: GRID
param.dialogReference:
Classified Grid

Grid, input

Synchronize with look-up table classification of another grid (gui only).

param.name: METHOD
param.dialogReference:
Replace Condition

Choice

Available Choices:

[0] identity

[1] range

[2] synchronize look-up table classification

Default: 0

param.name: IDENTITY
param.dialogReference:
Lookup Table

Static table

2 Fields:

- 1. [8 byte floating point number] New Value

- 2. [8 byte floating point number] Value

param.name: RANGE
param.dialogReference:
Lookup Table

Static table

3 Fields:

- 1. [8 byte floating point number] New Value

- 2. [8 byte floating point number] Minimum

- 3. [8 byte floating point number] Maximum

tool.summary: Changes values of a grid according to the rules of a user defined lookup table. Values or value ranges that are not listed in the lookup table remain unchanged. If the target is not set, the changes will be stored to the original grid.

dataIdInfo.idCredit: Conrad, O., Bechtel, B., Bock, M., Dietrich, H., Fischer, E., Gerlitz, L., Wehberg, J., Wichmann, V., and Boehner, J. (2015): System for Automated Geoscientific Analyses (SAGA) v. 2.1.4, Geosci. Model Dev., 8, 1991-2007, doi:10.5194/gmd-8-1991-2015. [SAGA - System for Automated Geoscientific Analyses - saga-gis.org]
